attributes.action: Gaining personal or family benefit from enacted legislation
attributes.additional_details:
We the people require that our representatives be prohibited from gaining personal or familial benefit through their enaction of any law or regulation during their time as either a member of the House of Commons or their time as a member of the Peerage.
Where such benefit occurs there shall be a sentence of no less than 10 years penal servitude imposed.In addition to compulsory removal from the relevant house.
